name: Diality -windows
description:
This is a project that I and 6 others created for the 2022 Global Game Jam!

We talk about our game here starting at around 37:00: https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1281873197

This is our Global Game Jam page: https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/dialality-3

You can find the web playable version here: https://talec.itch.io/dialityweb

personal plug: I am also looking for work visit my basic web site at: https://talec.github.io/Eckmann_modern_portfolio/
